channel.title: Object coding help?
channel.description:
Hi. I'm having 2 errors when compiling this code: [CODE] Case 8878: { if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 3000000)==false)) { sendMessage("Not enough money dude"); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 3000000)==true)) { ReplaceItems(4872,4712); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4878,4714); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4860,4708); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4866,4710); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4884,4716); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4890,4718); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4896,4720); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4902,4722); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4908,4724); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4914,4726); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4920,4728); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4926,4730); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4932,4732); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4938,4734); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4944,4736); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4950,4738); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4956,4745); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4962,4747); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4968,4749); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4974,4751); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4980,4753); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4986,4755); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4992,4757); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4998,4759); //veracs 0 } } break;[/CODE]
I get these errors when compiling: [CODE]client.java:2361: not a statement Case 8878: ^ client.java:2361: ';' expected Case 8878: ^[/CODE]
I need help I tried re-writing it and moving it 3 times.
If you don't understand, I'm trying to make an object charge for your barrows items breaking and repairing.

case #:

not

item.title: Object coding help?
item.dc:creator: @Lol_zezima_died Lol zezima died
item.description:
@Lol_zezima_died wrote:

Hi.
I’m having 2 errors when compiling this code:

Case 8878: { if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 3000000)==false)) { sendMessage("Not enough money dude"); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 3000000)==true)) { ReplaceItems(4872,4712); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4878,4714); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4860,4708); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4866,4710); //ah 0 ReplaceItems(4884,4716); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4890,4718); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4896,4720); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4902,4722); //dharoks 0 ReplaceItems(4908,4724); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4914,4726); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4920,4728); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4926,4730); //guthans 0 ReplaceItems(4932,4732); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4938,4734); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4944,4736); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4950,4738); //karils 0 ReplaceItems(4956,4745); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4962,4747); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4968,4749); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4974,4751); //torags 0 ReplaceItems(4980,4753); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4986,4755); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4992,4757); //veracs 0 ReplaceItems(4998,4759); //veracs 0 } } break;

I get these errors when compiling:

client.java:2361: not a statement Case 8878: ^ client.java:2361: ';' expected Case 8878: ^

I need help I tried re-writing it and moving it 3 times.

If you don’t understand, I’m trying to make an object charge for your barrows items breaking and repairing.

Read full topic
